item.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
item.description: That is a truly delightful Spider-Man movie. It’s a bit weird seeing him introduced after the events of Captain America: Civil War) and completely skipping how he became Spider-Man in the first place… but it works. I really like the entire plot, dealing with the fallout of the Avengers / super-hero activity and how normal people try to live their lives around it–and what happens when the powers that be step in and take that away from them. Excellent villain fuel. It’s a little silly that the Vulture ends up being Spider-Man's crush's father... , but I suppose that’s the sort of thing you expect from superhero films. Plotwise, it’s a solid, fun action film.
